libraries.name: BlockuinoPixelArcade
libraries.author: Joachim Haagen Skeie
libraries.sentence: An Arduino Library for building pixel-graphics animation and games on WS2812B LED panels
libraries.paragraph: This library simplifies building LED animations and games on NeoPixel (WS2812-family LEDs) LED Panels. Built for use with the Blockuino Block-coding-library.
